name: Finding Paradise (itch)
description:
Warning: Flashing Images (kinda, but please don't risk it)

Use arrow keys or AWSD to walk and progress the story.

This game is semi auto-biographical in depicting how I don't feel like I fit into any communities or labels. Of course it's a fantastical interpretation. It also represents my feelings of being overwhelmed and anxious. 

However you intend to interpret the game, I hope you can find your paradise. 

Made using Bitsy (created by Adam De Loux) and with the help of Pixsy and my fantastic friends and peers who play tested and gave suggestions.
